name: Send-Off (VR)
description:
#ShacknewsJam - Theme "Meme Walls"

Storytelling

Whenever a user leaves Shacknews Chatty their farewell involves mystical and technological situations inside the computer. Your task is to ensure that this mission will be complete.


GAMEPLAY and OBJECTIVE: 

You need to collect all the floppy disk to send a message farewell. Unfortunately  the final boss dynamics were not made on time, but there is a cool surprise when sent the collected items.


Teleport: Use JoystickPressed

Collect Item: TriggerPressed

Have fun! Thanks.txt

Created by: Jonathas Mariano (Programmer) and Marcos Silva (3D, Level Design, UX).
